The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, the crew are found in an area with spikes with feeding tubes going all throughout the place and capturing the crew immediately, saving themselves. Unfortunately the search party gets caught under the spikes as well. This is a very straight foward movie and hard to get engaged once you realize some things go on from start to the end.
